revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Jump}} '''A_DragonCheckCrash'''
(''no parameter'')
{{JumpNotice}} Checks if the actor has hit the floor. If so, it jumps to the Crash state. This is the same as doing the following: DRAG J 4 [[A_JumpIf]] (z <= floorz, "Crash") This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Dragon}} and derived classes.
